title: Negotiate a Contract Clause
description: During a contract negotiation, an in-house counsel needs to redline a clause and propose alternative language.

tasks.description: Identify the unfavorable clause in the draft agreement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pinpoints the specific clause to be changed.

tasks.description: Draft a 'redline' version of the contract, striking through the original language and inserting the company's preferred language from its playbook.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a redlined version of the document showing the proposed changes.

tasks.description: Draft a cover email to the opposing counsel explaining the business and legal reasons for the proposed change.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a persuasive email to accompany the redlined draft.
